document.full_text: molson coors brewing co  and mexico's grupo modelo  are exploring a joint bid for australia's foster's group ltd , a source said, amid talk further suitors may emerge for the maker of vb and cascade beer.
document.title: modelo and molson mull joint bid for foster's: source
lines_and_colors: molson coors brewing co  and mexico's grupo modelo  are exploring a joint bid for australia's foster's group ltd , a source said, amid talk further suitors may emerge for the maker of vb and cascade beer.
